Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to always love material with flawed protagonists and morally ambiguous people

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: To stay true to your art is such a complicated journey, and Dad clearly has done it

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wondered what it would be like to have a normal childhood

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is a scary thing

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: Every role is a new form of surrender

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to go to Jupiter. That was my plan from day one, and David Lynch gave me the ticket

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in flawed protagonists. I was raised on them

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved film more than theater

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be great to make a movie that had the style of a great '30's film

Quote.Author: Laura Dern
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a strange world, as David Lynch would say

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: A magnetic personality doesn't necessarily indicate a good heart

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal seems to me at times just to be business first

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people's personalities are so compelling that they command attention

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing the right thing has power

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: The good thing is that I'm always honest

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a good imagination and I still have one; a child-like imagination that hasn't gone away

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: History's a resource

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope that anyone I worked with wouldn't exploit our relationship

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: Tanning is tricky, because a lot of people just look orange

Quote.Author: Laura Linney
Quote.QuoteValue: Working with special needs children is hard

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am so like Donna it's funny. And most of my friends are guys too

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the tomboy so I got to be a little butch

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't stand being around anal people, especially anal people with big egos

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: Free love sounds great

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being a redhead. It's a rare thing, so I think there's a bond between redheads

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: My vintage Levi's are my favorite on the show, 'cause they really fit

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in real life, I'd rather hang out with guys

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a sun person

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know how people recognize me

Quote.Author: Laura Prepon
Quote.QuoteValue: You can always turn a bad kisser into a good one

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Women seem not to understand, or underestimate, the profound power they have over their husbands

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is what a salmon must feel like. They are always going upstream, against the current

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of a jock. I sail, I ride a bike, I hike, I pump iron. I just love to be active

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm a Harley Babe

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are very emotionally dependent upon women from the day they are born to the day they expire

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: I pretty much preach, teach and nag

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: On the Day of Atonement, Jews are commanded to seek forgiveness from the people we have hurt

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: I climb mountains

Quote.Author: Laura Schlessinger
Quote.QuoteValue: Research indicates that most women want their man to earn more than they do

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in New Orleans, goes home with you

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Like most creative people I don't fit well into boxes

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone spends their lives trying to balance their world between good and evil

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel that if you are blessed, or lucky enough, to be doing well, you should help others

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: You either mellow at 30, or your head explodes - take your choice

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a kiss to be so believable it gives the reader shivers

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: You'd think a sociopath assassin wouldn't have a fan following but he does

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: By 17, I was submitting to publications and collecting my first rejection slips

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a morning person

Quote.Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: My writing style is very sensual, as in sensory detail

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman isn't complete without a man. But where do you find a man - a real man - these days?

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a has-been. I am a will be

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn to rise above a lot of bad things that happen in your life. And you have to keep going

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: Legends are all to do with the past and nothing to do with the present

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: I think your whole life shows in your face and you should be proud of that

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: Find me a man who's interesting enough to have dinner with and I'll be happy

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: I am essentially a loner

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish Frank Sinatra would just shut up and sing

Quote.Author: Lauren Bacall
Quote.QuoteValue: Stardom isn't a profession, it's an accident

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm into mellow dates with really good food

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: When you do multiple things you love, it doesn't feel like work

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of my branding has come from stubbornness - I knew what I liked. I knew what I wanted to do

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't met a woman without insecurities

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Dating in Los Angeles can be hard, which makes it all the better when you meet a really nice guy

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my biggest goals, especially with writing YA novels, is just to have people enjoy reading

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: I do most of my shopping online. It's just convenient for me

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Imperfection is relatable

Quote.Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to design bridal dresses

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up an only child with a single parent is probably why I'm an actor

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made out more this season on a family-friendly show than ever in my actual life

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: The parts for women, you're either like the quietly suffering wife or the wild girl

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm nice, and I show up on time

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Perspective is the most important thing to have in life

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, all I ever want to be wearing are jeans

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to be part of a family, however that looks. Family is really important to me

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: None of my characters have really had jobs

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I take the no-doughnut pledge, and then I break it

Quote.Author: Lauren Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: I always saw myself as a comedic actor and wacky best friend

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: Going to church doesn't make you any more a Christian than going to the garage makes you a car

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: If a cluttered desk is the sign of a cluttered mind, what is the significance of a clean desk?

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: Bureaucracy defends the status quo long past the time when the quo has lost its status

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: Competence, like truth, beauty, and contact lenses, is in the eye of the beholder

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't know where you're going, you will probably end up somewhere else

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: In a hierarchy, every employee tends to rise to his level of incompetence

Quote.Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: Respect for ourselves guides our morals, respect for others guides our manners

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: An English man does not travel to see English men

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain and pleasure, like light and darkness, succeed each other

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Tis known by the name of perseverance in a good cause, and of obstinacy in a bad one

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: Men tire themselves in pursuit of rest

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: God tempers the wind to the shorn lamb

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: An actor should be able to create the universe in the palm of his hand

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all duties, prayer certainly is the sweetest and most easy

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself

Quote.Author: Laurence Sterne
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is so perfectly amusing as a total change of ideas

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is easy. It's deception that's the hard work

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to be surrounded by people as passionate and as dedicated as I am

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe God will make a way

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know anybody that's not emotionally unstable or schizophrenic

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: What was freely given to me, I freely give

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't know how much artists go through to make it look so easy. It's all in the practice

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't want people to have expectations of us, but then we have expectations of everybody else

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we do should be a result of our gratitude for what God has done for us

Quote.Author: Lauryn Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: The less I have, the freer I am to do whatever I want to do

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: As a free-market guy, I love competition. That includes political competition

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Wars breed unfairness, just as they breed collateral damage

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Reduced marginal tax rates on individuals and business fosters growth every time

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Obamacare rules and mandates are job-killers

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: For Clinton, I don't see redemption. She is a corrupt political operative of the worst kind

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Contributing to GOP unity, Pence is a churchgoing evangelical family man

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Trump-Pence is a winner for the GOP

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Middle-income wage earners have essentially had no pay increases since 2000

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Facebook is a private company and, therefore, is entitled to whatever political biases it holds

Quote.Author: Lawrence Kudlow
Quote.QuoteValue: Trump promised an 'America First' foreign policy rooted in the national interest, not in nostalgia

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: As players, we always have a way to get back at you

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a whole different type of lifestyle

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: I like companies that try and break away from the norm

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: In football, you can always maim a person if you wanted to

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: LT was just a wilder person. I don't go that route no more

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: People get hurt all the time in the game of football, it's part of what we do

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: Steroids are for guys who want to cheat opponents

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: You try to stay within the rules for the sake of the game, but you can always turn up the intensity

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, a player has to know what is banned and what is not banned

Quote.Author: Lawrence Taylor
Quote.QuoteValue: And once you cross over into that world, no matter how strong you are, you have to pay the price

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: Over and over I marvel at the blessings of my life: Each year has grown better than the last

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: There are good days and there are bad days, and this is one of them

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: If they can't hum it after we play it, it's not for us

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: The William Penn Hotel in Pittsburgh... was the place where Champagne Music was born

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: Sounds always fascinated me

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing all stage mothers share is an overpowering ambition for their daughters

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: Music was my joy, my home, the one place I felt happy and secure

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: It's curious how we act in moments of personal despair

Quote.Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote.QuoteValue: I expected to be a farmer like my father and brothers. Life seemed pleasant and orderly

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: At home I'm just a guy who has interests that extend far beyond music

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: Drugs are not the way to the light. They won't lead to a fairy-tale life, they lead to suffering

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: Drugs will have a huge effect on my work for the rest of my life, whether I'm using or not

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do much else but stay in my hotel room

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I can go anywhere I want. If only I knew where to go

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't read anything but regurgitated rumors. Nothing new, and nothing true

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing like a lark

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could just hug you all, but I'm not gonna

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the career I'm lucky enough to get paid for, but I have other desires and passions

Quote.Author: Layne Staley
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the doorway that has led me to drawing, photography, and writing

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being outdoors - hiking, biking, and swimming

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I love myself, the way I look, my body, but sometimes I can't help but feel insecure

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: How many managers told me, 'Get a nose job. You're not pretty enough?' But I proved them wrong

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I worried that people wouldn't like me. Now I try not to worry and focus on being happy

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew what I wanted to be at 8 years old - an actor!

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been such a fan of Habitat for Humanity and the work that they do

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love Kate Middleton to be in 'Glee.' Wouldn't that be fantastic? That would be great

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I make a vegan baked ziti. And even though that doesn't sound enjoyable, it really is

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: Theatre just fills me up so much

Quote.Author: Lea Michele
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm honored to be in a position to have young girls or performers look up to me

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not as beautiful as a model

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: I was putting forward too much of myself when I was singing

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in between takes, you emerge yourself. So you don't have a life for six months

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not reading reviews and critics. I don't care. I guess I'm still a little on my own planet

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, cinema's like a language - everyone has their own form of it

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any preconceived ideas of myself. I just take things as they come

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: My proudest moment is when I'm part of a good film, when people are touched by it

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: In America, you don't have to be weak, you have to be strong

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: If I do too many takes, I'm too self-conscious. I think I'm better in first scenes

Quote.Author: Lea Seydoux
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether you're in a blockbuster or an art film, you have to be able to adapt

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: In my deepest parts of sadness, I'm always making a joke or being sarcastic

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: And I definitely gravitate toward people who use laughter to pull themselves out of the abyss

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard not to want to strangle people when you work with them for four years

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like a class system. I don't like the idea of being in a different class than other people

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always really excited to try something new in my profession that I haven't done yet

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's actually shocking to me how hard it's been to get back into the movie business

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually, you don't really end up lifelong buddies with your co-stars

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sitcoms are usually given short shrift by the acting profession, but it's quite an amazing job

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not overweight, but I'm not in shape at all. I do not work out

Quote.Author: Lea Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I mostly played 'Pac-Man', but I played 'The Sims' with my kids when they were growing up

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: No doubt one may quote history to support any cause, as the devil quotes scripture

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are not pebbles in alien juxtaposition

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: A self-made man may prefer a self-made name

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end it is worse to suppress dissent than to run the risk of heresy

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: The spirit of liberty is the spirit which is not too sure that it is right

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: If we are to keep democracy, there must be a commandment: Thou shalt not ration justice

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are chameleons, which reflect the color of their environment

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of law is the maximum gratification of the nervous system of man

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: Thou shalt not ration justice

Quote.Author: Learned Hand
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of publicity is a black art; but it has come to stay, and every year adds to its potency

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be able to accept failure to get better

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: I treated it like every day was my last day with a basketball

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: I like criticism. It makes you strong

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have that respect from your teammates, it makes it a lot more comfortable

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm confident with my ability

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, team first. It allows me to succeed, it allows my team to succeed

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: I laugh and joke, but I don't get distracted very easily

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: Every night on the court I give my all, and if I'm not giving 100 percent, I criticize myself

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to use all my tools, my God-given ability, and make the best life I can with it

Quote.Author: LeBron James
Quote.QuoteValue: And winning is a huge thing for me

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: The fall of the Berlin Wall makes for nice pictures. But it all started in the shipyards

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: He who puts out his hand to stop the wheel of history will have his fingers crushed

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: Our national history has so often filled us with bitterness and the feeling of helplessness

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the veil of silence fall presently over what happened afterwards. Silence, too, can speak out

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: I got politics and economics moving and then others took over

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: We hold our heads high, despite the price we have paid, because freedom is priceless

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something of the warrior in me

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: Authority must be respected and chosen wisely

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to light the lights of patriotism

Quote.Author: Lech Walesa
Quote.QuoteValue: I am happy that Poland is returning to the road of pluralism and democracy

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a kind of old-fashioned, artisan approach

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: I've discovered writers by reading books left in airplane seats and weird hotels

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always tense when you move a character from a book to the screen. Always tense

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what the secret is when I am writing it - it really is a surprise to me

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always sad if anybody you know has a personal problem

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: A calm environment is for after I finish work

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to write a thriller is to ask a question at the beginning, and answer it at the end

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to thrillers is vicarious pleasure

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Birmingham, where they made useful things and made them well

Quote.Author: Lee Child
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is showbusiness for shy people. That's how I see it

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to sell my soul to Hollywood - to just make run-of-the-mill stuff

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work with fear, and I don't work with actors that are fearful

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to go to places that are unexpected of me because people really think they have me pegged

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really vegan. I'm vegan-ish. I have a piece of lamb every now and then

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I love actors, and I'm very protective of them. I trust them. It's a mutual trust

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the father-son love story is a universal one which transcends color

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have a lot of siblings, you always do something to feel special

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: I have twins that I didn't want to have the life that I had. I didn't have a great life growing up

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: America is fickle. You never know what they're going to go for

Quote.Author: Lee Daniels
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of my friends don't have a cell phone. Patti LaBelle doesn't have a cell phone

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: The speed of the boss is the speed of the team

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: In the end, all business operations can be reduced to three words: people, product, and profits

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: I hire people brighter than me and then I get out of their way

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to pause and ask ourselves: How much clean air do we need?

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed today, you have to set priorities, decide what you stand for

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for accurate knowledge. Know yourself, know your business, know your men

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: Management is nothing more than motivating other people

Quote.Author: Lee Iacocca
Quote.QuoteValue: We are continually faced by great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are going to lower me into the grave, and I feel something is wrong, I will get up

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem is to keep the monkey mind from running off into all kinds of thoughts

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: China is a vast, disparate country; there is no alternative to strong central power

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: You either use the Internet or you are backward

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: I would not score very highly on religious value

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: If Singapore is a nanny state, then I am proud to have fostered one

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tried to be correct, not politically correct

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: I had some very powerful minds working with me

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace and security both in Europe and in the Pacific still depend on a balance of power

Quote.Author: Lee Kuan Yew
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not guided by what Human Rights Watch says
